1: <pb/><t>Tato sco pac junoc lolonel d'a emnaquilal, stup oval yuuj. Tato ov scutej co pacan jun, ste vach' q'ue vaan oval chi'.</t>
2: <t>Ayic slolon eb' ay spensar, a jelanil syic' eb' anima d'a eb'. Axo yic slolon eb' malaj spensar jun, an̈ej man̈ pensaril syal eb'.</t>
3: <t>Ayn̈ejec' Jehová d'a masanil b'aj, syiln̈ej tas sc'ulej eb' chuc yed' eb' vach'.</t>
4: <t>A lolonel vach' tz'alchaj d'ayon̈, syac' snivanil co c'ool, ichato tzon̈ yan̈tej. Axo pax chucal lolonel tz'alchaj d'ayon̈ jun, scab' val syail yuuj.</t>
5: <t>A eb' malaj spensar, chuc syab' eb' ayic tz'ac'ji scachnab'il eb' yuj smam. Axo eb' ay spensar jun, scha sc'ol scachnab'il eb' syac' smam.</t>
6: <t>Man̈ jantacoc tas ay d'a yol spat eb' anima vach' spensar. Axo eb' chuc jun, max yac'laj sgana eb' yed' tas syac' ganar.</t>
7: <t>Ayic slolon eb' ay spensar, a jelanil syalel eb'. Axo eb' malaj spensar jun, malaj yelc'och tas syal eb'.</t>
8: <t>A silab' eb' chuc, max schalaj sc'ol Jehová, palta scha val yab'i ayic slesalvi eb' tojol spensar d'ay.</t>
9: <t>Max schalaj sc'ool Jehová schuc b'eyb'al eb' chuc, palta te xajan eb' sb'eyb'alan tojolal yuuj.</t>
10: <t>A eb' tz'actancan svach' b'eyb'al, smojton val yac'ji syaelal eb'. Smoj val scham eb' malaj sgana scachji.</t>
11: <t>Syil Jehová chajtil yilji b'aj ay eb' chamnac, ¿tocval max yil pax co pensar?</t>
12: <t>A eb' te b'uchumtac, malaj sgana eb' ay mach scachani, toxon max sc'anb'ej junoc razón eb' d'a eb' ay spensar.</t>
13: <t>A eb' stzalaji, stzetzon sat eb'. Axo pax eb' scus jun, tz'och pitz'an yaelal d'a spixan eb'.</t>
14: <t>A eb' ay spensar, snib'ej eb' svach' ojtaquejel jelanil. Axo eb' malaj spensar jun, stzalaj eb' yed' sman̈ pensaril chi'.</t>
15: <t>A eb' ilc'olal yaji, cuseltacn̈ej tz'ec' junjun c'u d'a eb'. Axo pax eb' tzalajc'olal yaj jun, q'uin̈n̈ej d'a eb' junjun c'u.</t>
16: <t>Tato ay yelc'och Jehová d'ayon̈, yelxo te vach' quico' vach'chom meb'a' on̈, d'a yichan̈ pax to ay co tumin palta ilc'olaln̈ej caji.</t>
17: <t>Te vach' tato sco xajanej co b'a vach'chom an̈ej an̈ itaj sco chi'a, d'a yichan̈ pax an̈ej noc' chib'ej sco chi'a tato ovaln̈ej caji.</t>
18: <t>A eb' c'un scot yoval, an̈ej oval sq'ue vaan yuj eb'. Axo pax eb' ay snivanc'olal jun, syac' tup oval eb'.</t>
19: <t>A d'a eb' jaragana, icha val to a te q'uiix ayem d'a yol sb'e eb'. Axo pax eb' anima vach' spensar jun, vach'n̈ej sb'e eb'.</t>
20: <t>A eb' uninab'il ay spensar, syac' tzalajb'oc sc'ool smam snun eb'. Axo eb' malaj spensar jun, syac' q'uixvelal smam snun eb' chi'.</t>
21: <t>A eb' malaj spensar, stzalaj eb' yed' sman̈ pensaril chi'. Axo eb' ay spensar jun, scham val yilan eb' tas sb'eyb'alej.</t>
22: <t>Tato max co c'anb'ej razón, masanil tas sco na' max elc'ochlaj. Tato sco cha cab' razón vach' jun, vach'n̈ej tz'aj yelc'ochi.</t>
23: <t>Te vach' tato vach' scutej co pacan lolonel. Tato scac' junoc razón ayic ay ilc'olal, yelxo val te vach'.</t>
24: <t>A eb' ay spensar, sb'ey eb' d'a sb'eal q'uinal yic vach' max b'atcan eb' d'a sb'eal chamel.</t>
25: <t>A Jehová satanel tas ay d'a eb' ac'umtac, palta a stan̈van sluum eb' ix ix chamnacxo yetb'eyum.</t>
26: <t>Max schalaj sc'ol Jehová tastac nab'il yuj eb' chuc, palta a lolonel vach' scha sc'ool.</t>
27: <t>A eb' man̈ jantacoc tas snib'ej, man̈ jantacoc tas syic'cot eb' d'a yib'an̈ eb' cajan yed' d'a yol spat. Axo eb' max chaan q'uen tumin yic smontaji, snajatb'i sq'uinal eb'.</t>
28: <t>A eb' tojol spensar, scham val snaan eb' tas syutej spacan junoc lolonel. Axo pax eb' chuc spensar jun, ton̈ej scomon alej chucal lolonel eb'.</t>
29: <t>A Jehová sb'at mican d'a eb' chuc sb'eyb'al, palta smaclej yab' slesal eb' tojol spensar.</t>
30: <t>A eb' stzetzon sat, stzalaj co c'ol yuj eb'. A junoc vach' ab'ix syac' co tec'anil.</t>
31: <t>Tato sco scha cab' co cachnab'il, vach' tzon̈ aj d'a scal eb' jelan spensar.</t>
32: <t>Tato malaj co gana tzon̈ cachji, munil a d'ayon̈ syac' chucal. Tato scha co c'ol co cachji jun, van quic'an co jelanil.</t>
33: <t>Tato sco c'anab'ajej schecnab'il Jehová, squic' co jelanil. Tato co gana nivan tz'aj quelc'ochi, yovalil emnaquil scutej co b'a.</t>
